name: StarFringe: Adversus
description: This is the story about the beginning of the conquest of outer space by earthlings. It began as a global idea of saving mankind from hunger and lack of resources, and ended as a brutal and merciless war in space far from Earth.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Pentium III Memory: 2000 MB RAM Graphics: 512 Mb DirectX Videocard DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX SoundCard
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 4000 MB RAM Graphics: 512 Mb DirectX Videocard DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX SoundCard
